comments.comment: Hi, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/hawkeyedesi>@hawkeyedesi</denchmark-link> . Thanks for reporting and for the gist. Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/fepegar>@fepegar</denchmark-link> thanks for the feedback.
I haven't been able to replicate on the original tutorial nor locally, and the gist is unfortunately not self-contained.

I was following this tutorial: <denchmark-link:https://colab.research.google.com/github/fepegar/torchio-notebooks/blob/main/notebooks/TorchIO_tutorial.ipynb>https://colab.research.google.com/github/fepegar/torchio-notebooks/blob/main/notebooks/TorchIO_tutorial.ipynb</denchmark-link>
On Google Colab it ran correctly without errors. Steps to recreate the error:
I download the jupyter notebook and ran it on my local environment The gist file has a minimum example of the TorchIO_tutorial.ipynb to recreate the error. Attached is the conda yml file that I used when debugging this. I am running this on a Linux Box.
Thanks. I hope this helps. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/fepegar/torchio/files/5662201/torchio_debug.yml.zip>torchio_debug.yml.zip</denchmark-link>
I suspect there is a problem with PyTorch. I see from your YAML that you are using PyTorch 1.3. Can you update to a more recent version and try again?
Upgrading to Pytorch 1.7 fixed it. Thanks for your inputs.
